value.name: Death of Mark Chua - Wikipedia
value.snippet: Mark Welson Chua (November 30, 1981 - March 18, 2001) was a Filipino student of the University of Santo Tomas whose death is widely believed to be linked to his exposé of alleged irregularities in the Reserve Officers' Training Corps unit of the university.

value.name: Mark Chua - FilmFreeway
value.snippet: Mark Chua and Lam Li Shuen are filmmakers and artists whose work explores the possibilities of resistance in the presentation and production of narrativity. Their films have screened at international film festivals including the BFI London Film Festival (2021), Tampere Film Festival (2021) and Film Fest Gent (2022).

value.name: Mark Chua - Wikipedia
value.snippet: Mark Chua, Singaporean businessman who was implicated in the 2017 Ilocos Norte Tobacco Excise Tax funds controversy Mark Welson Chua, Filipino student of the University of Santo Tomas who exposed alleged irregularities in the Reserve Officers' Training Corps unit of the university; see Death of Mark Chua

value.name: Remembering Mark Welson Chua – Manila Bulletin
value.snippet: Twenty years ago, Mark Welson Chua, a Reserve Officers’ Training Corps (ROTC) cadet at the University of Santo Tomas (UST) was found lifeless in Pasig River. (Photo courtesy of Varsitarian) Chua’s decomposing body was fished out of the Pasig River on March 18, 2001.

value.name: Who Is Mark Chua Boyfriend Of Imee Marcos? - Mixedarticle
value.snippet: Mark Chua is a businessman from Singapore who has been a long-time partner of Imee. Mark Chua was the long-term boyfriend of Imee Marcos since the 1990s after she split with her ex-husband. There is, however, no confirmation regarding their marriage.

value.snippet: Attached to the beauty queen’s tweet was a screenshot of a news article about Marcos’ boyfriend, Mark Chua, going into hiding at the height of a congressional probe. value.name: Why is ROTC not mandatory anymore? A look into the brutal history
value.snippet: At the center of it all is the murder of Mark Welson Chua, a 19-year-old engineering sophomore and ROTC cadet at the University of Santo Tomas (UST). Prior to his death, Chua, alongside student Romulo Yumul, revealed alleged anomalies in the university’s ROTC program in the Varsitarian.
